name: Momentous: Monumentum
description:
Help Biip () reach the end of each course in this hand-crafted precision platformer with no cap on velocity.

Features:

  • Momentum-based platforming
  • Based platforming
  • Over 5 original music tracks
  • Fast respawn times
  • At least 17 levels
    • okay there's actually 21 levels but the last 4 are secret don't tell anyone
  • Controller support
  • Absurdism but in a funny way
  • Hand-drawn "art"
  • Speedrun timer
  • Bouncy walls

Originally made in 2020 for the GMTK Game Jam, Momentous quickly showed its potential for a full-fleshed game. I began development, refining existing features and creating new content. The final product has over double the level count of the original and a slew of new mechanics to go with them. I decided to rebrand it to Momentous: Monumentum to reflect just how different it is from the original.

You can join our official discord at https://discord.gg/bSeSuDV.
